name: @eventuras/web
description: Main web frontend for Eventuras - participant and organizer interface

NEXT_PUBLIC_APPLICATION_URL.description: Public URL where this application is hosted (e.g., http://localhost:3000)

NEXT_PUBLIC_LOGOUT_URL_REDIRECT.description: URL to redirect to after logout

NEXT_PUBLIC_DEFAULT_LOCALE.description: Default locale for internationalization (e.g., en-US, nb-NO)

NEXT_PUBLIC_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: The unique organization ID used to scope frontend configuration and assets

NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_SETTINGS_URL.description: Base URL for fetching public site settings and branding configuration

NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL.description: Backend API base URL for server-side calls (may differ from NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL)

AUTH0_CLIENT_ID.description: Auth0 client identifier used by the backend authentication flow (server-side only)

AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Auth0 client secret for server-side authentication (never expose to client)

AUTH0_API_AUDIENCE.description: Auth0 API audience identifier for token validation

SESSION_SECRET.description: Secret key for session encryption (must be a strong random string)
